Text: Intellectual Property Insurance Coverage Info and ApplicationAttached is some cusory information and related news article on insurance coverage currently being touted in the market for IP risks Coverage is avaialable for both offensive enforcement and defensive actions If youre interested in exploring specific applications for Enron Networks Im happy to arrange a meeting with the underwriter Jsut let me know Thanks David Marshall IParticlePDF App Defensivepdf IP Defense Pursuit Summarypdf

Intellectual Property Insurance Coverage Info and ApplicationAttached is some cusory information and related news article on insurance coverage currently being touted in the market for IP risks Coverage is avaialable for both offensive enforcement and defensive actions If youre interested in exploring specific applications for Enron Networks Im happy to arrange a meeting with the underwriter Jsut let me know Thanks David Marshall IParticlePDF App Defensivepdf IP Defense Pursuit Summarypdf

Re vehicle rental in Gillette Cc I suggest that if were unable to rent from either Avis or National that we elect the same levels of insurance coverage under the rental agreement with Enterprise as we have negotiated in the corporate contracts As information here is the summary of the insurance provided under the corporate rental car agreements this can be found at the intranet site accommhtml Car Rental Contracts Rental car contracts for January through December have been awarded to National Car Rental and Avis Rent A Car System Inc When you rent a vehicle from National or Avis under the Contract the daily rental rate includes two kinds of insurance LDWLossDamage Waiver This is what is called Comprehensive or Collision on your personal auto It covers the rental vehicle and pays for and damage to it Liability This covers persons and property outside the rental vehicle For both National and Avis the coverage is per person per occurrence and for property damage These coverages only apply when the vehicle is rented at the contract rate using the following state contract identifier numbers National Avis A Please call Tracy Ramsey Travel Manager at if you have any questions
Re OM Agreement DraftSorry to not have gotten this to you sooner but I have been buried today Please call me with questions

RE Comments to OM AgreementGerald My comments noted A few points as I read the contract client is paying for the insurance cost of BCCKOP and therefore should get full benefit of those policies not just limited to claims attributable to BCCKOPs gross negligencewillful misconduct BCCKOP is in full control of the Facility and therefore should wear some financial risk for damage to it arising out of the Operating Services I have limited this to k per occurrence our deductible for nonpower gen assets is MM Ive also made them take deductibles under their policies for third party liability and employee injury risks they had these on us originally and specified that their GL cover include pollution legal liability they had this on us also but since its a third party risk I think it should stay with the operator Call me if Ive got this wrong or if we need to discuss further Thx David

FW LRCI Inc ROWNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Follows is what I think to be the final version havent heard from Linda that she objects David Original Message From Marshall David Sent Wednesday September PM To Linda Casanova Subject RE LRCI Inc ROW Try this Original Message From Linda Casanova mailto Sent Wednesday September PM To Marshall David Cc Kyle Webster Subject FW LRCI Inc ROW David Just following up We need to process this ROW as soon as possible Thanks Linda Original Message From Linda Casanova Sent Tuesday September AM To Subject LRCI Inc ROW LRCI Amended Ins Sectionsdoc David Here are the insurance sections amended per our discussion Please review and add your primary wording Thanks for your help Linda

Re vehicle rental in Gillette Cc I suggest that if were unable to rent from either Avis or National that we elect the same levels of insurance coverage under the rental agreement with Enterprise as we have negotiated in the corporate contracts As information here is the summary of the insurance provided under the corporate rental car agreements this can be found at the intranet site accommhtml Car Rental Contracts Rental car contracts for January through December have been awarded to National Car Rental and Avis Rent A Car System Inc When you rent a vehicle from National or Avis under the Contract the daily rental rate includes two kinds of insurance LDWLossDamage Waiver This is what is called Comprehensive or Collision on your personal auto It covers the rental vehicle and pays for and damage to it Liability This covers persons and property outside the rental vehicle For both National and Avis the coverage is per person per occurrence and for property damage These coverages only apply when the vehicle is rented at the contract rate using the following state contract identifier numbers National Avis A Please call Tracy Ramsey Travel Manager at if you have any questions

Property Deductible Buydown Option Cc Jim Bouillion is the latest proposal from insurers for North American power gen assets Please review and adivse of your interest in pursuing this further Forwarded by David MarshallHOUECT on PM James L Bouillion PM To David CT Terry nron Paul E nron Nigel NRON Rino T ManzanoENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Roberto FigueroaENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Mariella MahanENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Per CT Paul CT Jonathan CT Subject Property Deductible Buydown Option We have an indication for a deductible buydown as outlined on the attached exhibit The premium due the underwriter is million plus we must assume the first million in losses in the aggregate above a combined deductible for property damage and business interruption of million In order to have funds available to pay losses we propose to house the million aggregate in Enrons captive where it would be available to pay claims excess of the million combined deductible as stated above After the million is expended the insurance underwriter will assume payment of losses subject to a per loss deductible of million property damage plus a day waiting period for business interruption This premium allocation is only valid if all listed assets participate We are not likely to get premium reductions equal to the allocated amounts if certain assets elect not to participate Once the incurred losses have been completely quantified we contemplate returning the unused portion of the million loss fund to the assets participating at the end of the policy term proportionately based on property values subject to the following exceptions Any asset having a loss would receive no loss fund refund Any asset exiting the program early would receive no loss fund refund Please indicate by noon central standard time on March your decision relating to this proposal
